pages.text: Sieving Gravel and using the Iron Mesh will output:$(br)-Copper Piece: 0.2$(br)-Flint: 0.2$(br)-Aluminum Piece: 0.15$(br)-Iron Piece: 0.15$(br)-Tin Piece: 0.1$(br)-Zinc Piece: 0.1$(br)-Nickel Piece: 0.08$(br)-Silver Piece: 0.06$(br)-Gold Piece: 0.05$(br)-Osmium Piece: 0.05$(br)-Uranium Piece: 0.04
